question: Information Technology (IT) helps in monitoring and protecting the environment.
Air Quality Index (AQI) is not used to monitor pollution levels.

Smart bins use sensors to detect when they are full.

Weather forecasting systems use satellites and computers to predict natural disasters.
Telemedicine allows doctors to provide healthcare services only in hospitals.

Wearable health devices like smartwatches cannot track heart rate or sleep patterns.
Artificial Intelligence (AI) helps in diagnosing diseases and analyzing medical reports.
Social media cannot be used to spread awareness about diseases and health tips.
